description: Client configuration for interest accrual on overdue Xero invoices

columns.name: XeroContactID
columns.description: Xero contact GUID (from Xero contact URL)

columns.name: AnnualRate
columns.description: Annual interest rate as percentage (e.g., 18 for 18%)

columns.name: MinDaysOverdue
columns.description: Days past due before interest starts accruing

columns.name: MinChargeAmount
columns.description: Minimum interest amount to create a charge (skip smaller amounts)

columns.name: CurrencyCode
columns.description: If set, only calculate for invoices in this currency. Leave blank for all.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Enable/disable interest calculation for this client

columns.name: LastRunDate
columns.description: Last time interest was calculated for this client (updated by flow)

columns.name: LastInvoiceID
columns.description: Xero invoice ID of most recent interest invoice created

columns.name: Notes
columns.description: Internal notes about this client's interest configuration

initialData.Notes: Primary client - 18% annual rate per agreement
